description.value:
You've sworn an oath to protect the holy places within nature and the spirits that dwell within, from ancient trees to primordial wild guardians. You can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Make an Impression] on animals and to make very simple Requests of them. In most cases, wild animals will give you time to make your case. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression when interacting with a beast, fey, or kami. You gain the following edict.

Edict You must aid any animal or nature spirit in need unless it violates your other tenets or puts someone else at risk of immediate harm.
